summary: This is an email chain from October 20, 2020, regarding the coordination of an Epstein-related briefing or event. It involves FBI Victim Services Division personnel and DOJ/CRT officials discussing invitation drafts, RSVP questionnaires, and clearance procedures, including a recommendation to consult OPA (Office of Public Affairs) due to potential public interest.

events.title: Epstein Briefing Event Planning
events.description: Coordination of an Epstein-related briefing or event, involving drafting invitations, RSVP questionnaires, and clearance procedures with a recommendation to involve OPA.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated October 20, 2020, and pertains to planning an Epstein-related briefing or event.
FBI Victim Services Division and DOJ/CRT officials are involved in coordinating the event, including drafting invitations and RSVP questionnaires.
A recommendation is made to run event materials by the Office of Public Affairs (OPA) due to the potential for parts of it to become public.
The document references an attachment named 'Draft Invitation v2.docx' and '2020 RSVP_Questionnaire v2.docx'.
The email subject indicates it is regarding a 'Revised meeting invitation and RSVP questionnaire' for an 'Epstein Briefing'.
